title: can't log into router
content:
Can't log into router. Works with Chrome and Edge 192.168.2.1

Tried this says in the router's Admin page: Access setting page via https://router.asus.com:8443 * Please use port 1024-65535. With and without :80 and :433

Tried everything I can find on this site and Google. Has worked for many years.
creator: alan187

title: Pages do not open, Blank screen for any URL
content:
Firefox browser does not function when logged into AD domain. It works fine if using local account. This was not an issue until recently (perhaps a month). FW settings are open and websites are functional on other browsers, but after an Windows Security Update Firefox will not load any pages. It will not even open Settings tab. No bookmarks work.

I have uninstalled and tried to reinstall, and the windows update or the package install crash before install initiates. Logged into laptop local and was able to install, but when using domain account the problem reoccurs. Note, browser was functional until windows patch and indicators are of some .NET framework corruption.
creator: meng3

title: Can I get below 50 tab width?
content: The minimum tab width build into Firefox is 50. I'm used to much lower from Chrome, and would like it to be lower. I have many tabs open at the same time, and being able to see them all is what I'm used to. Instead of having to scroll for long time, it's really annoying! I saw a post that there used to be an extension which let you do this, but it stopped working with an older version of Firefox. Any help is greatly appreciated. :) Have a great day!
creator: schmidteren

title: The "Inspector" of the "Developer Tool" for misinformation?
content:
They are aware that through the "Inspector" option of the "Developers Tool" you can change the values of the elements of a web page (online or not) to try to spread false information or misinform about a topic that, for example, Have you been touched by a verified or popular account on social media?

They can offer some recommendations to non-expert users, so that they are aware that it is possible and the problem is present, and how to avoid the misinformation that can be spread after a malicious user changes the value of an element of a web page (social networks, news, among others), take a screenshot and share it on social networks?
creator: J052

title: Console Response not showing HTML - only shows "raw"
content:
In Firefox 107.0.1 64-bit (Windows 10)

When looking at the console, the response tab no longer shows rendered HTML code - the response is blank.

Only if I select "Raw" over on the right do I see anything - only code.

Is this new behaviour from Firefox, or have I inadvertently changed an option?

The only way to now see the rendered page is through the "Network" tab.

Please see images.
creator: tim.jordan

title: A cada atualização, uma piora substancial. Consumindo 86% de memória de um notebook de 8GB.
content: Já são anos, inclusive já fui banido daqui por reclamar demais dos mesmos problemas cujo nunca houveram uma solução. O exemplo desta semana passada é mais do que simples: Duas atualizações demandadas, ambas realizadas e como de costume, o meu navegador Mozilla Firefox não abre site nenhum. Eu sou obrigado a usar o Google Chrome para entrar no site deste suporte, por exemplo. As vezes eu demoro até 2h, 120min, para abrir um site qualquer. Não tenho acesso a nada pelo Mozilla, a não ser que eu espere. Por que eu insisto nele? Ainda é o navegador que além de constituir minhas informações necessárias, ele já está com tudo que eu preciso. Outro ponto é que não tenho nenhuma extensão instalada, já fiz durante os anos a maioria das dicas de melhoria para a questão de lentidão e travamentos e não, nunca funcionou. Realidade é que a cada atualização, piora o desempenho aqui. Volto a dizer que já fui banido por realizar as mesmas reclamações, do mesmo nível. Esta é a primeira numa nova conta, cheguei a fazer mais de 100 reclamações do mesmo sentido. É impossível que alguém tenha que esperar até 120min para abrir um site. Também é impossível que seja um problema do meu computador, visto que tudo funciona voando, menos o Mozilla. Tenho para mim que o assunto é PESSOAL, sofro retaliações dos funcionários da empresa com esse tanto de atualizações que não tem se quer uma descrição DO QUE ESTÁ SENDO ATUALIZADO. Aí eu pergunto: Qual é o problema comigo? Qual é o problema Mozilla? Por que nunca houve o mínimo de melhoria na lentidão e funcionamento do navegador, ao menos comigo? O exemplo de hoje é o seguinte: estou assistindo Copa do Mundo pelo site da Globo, e, estou desde 10h da manhã esperando para abrir o site, só abriu quando já estava com 13min de jogo, ou seja, minutos atrás. E isso vem sendo recorrente. Jogos das 7h da manhã, eu acordava as 5h. É o cúmulo da sacanagem com o usuário do navegador, O CÚMULO. É uma sacanagem do caramba! Acham que é mentira? Parem para ver os comentários e as reclamações sobre o Mozilla. Façam este exercício e avaliem se tem mesmo uma boa postura profissional conosco.
creator: twittesk

title: G.İ.B. E-posta Bilgilendirme Üyelik Başvurusu olmuyor (ACİL ÇÖZÜM-ACİL ÇÖZÜM-ACİL ÇÖZÜM)
content: iyi günler hayırlı çalışmalar mozilla tarayıcısını istiyerek ve severek kullanıyorum.lakin https://www.gib.gov.tr/e_posta_bilgilendirme_aboneligi bu siteye üyelik oluşturmaya çalışıyorum.bir türlü olmuyor.G.İ.B. E-posta Bilgilendirme Üyelik Başvurusu yapıyorum.onaylamak bana mail geliyor.maili açtığımda GİB "Web Tabanlı Bilgilendirme Sistemi" üyeliğinizin onayı veya iptali için, lütfen aşağıdaki bağlantıları kullanınız.yazıyor Onay için; https://intvd.gib.gov.tr/gibUyelik/gibUyelikOnay.jsp?key=0ck2x20mzd1lmx925sn İptal için; https://intvd.gib.gov.tr/gibUyelik/gibUyelikIptal.jsp?key=0ck2x20mzd1lmx925sn tıklayamıyorum.çünkü tıklama yapıldığı zaman https://intvd.gib.gov.tr/gibUyelik/gibUyelikOnay.jsp?key=0ck2x20mzd1lmx925sn bu yazı mavi alt çizgili gelmesi gerekiyor ama gelmiyor.tıklama ekranı gelmiyor.adresi mozilla sitesine kopyalama yaptığım zaman da G.İ.B. E-POSTA BİLGİLENDİRME ÜYELİK BAŞVURUSU ONAYI HATA Onaylama Sırasında Hata Oluştu. Sorunu abonelik@gelirler.gov.tr adresine e-posta ile bildiriniz! bu şekilde bana mesaj veriyor.bir türlü bu problemi çözemedik bu konuda sizden acil cevap bekliyorum.ve bu siteye bir türlü üyelik kaydı olmuyor bu durumu yaani mail görüştüm maliye vergi dairesi ile görüştüm.lakin sonuca varadım.sizden acil yardım bekliyorum bu konuyla çözüm yapmanızı isiyorum.

title: Netflix won't play in Private Browsing Mode (Netflix Error F7701-1003)
content:
So I have my FireFox settings set to always be in private browsing mode and it hasn't caused me any issues with anything but Netflix. I've tried every solution that Netflix recommends for this error code, I tried changing the IndexedDB permissions in private browsing, I tried disabling DuckDuckGo and TotalAdBlocker extensions but so far the only thing I've found that fixes the problem is to open a non-private browsing window. Is there any way to get Netflix to work in a private browsing window so that my history won't be tracked??

I've attached a screenshot of the Netflix error screen if that helps.

title: I am unable to remove icon from toolbar
content:
I have installed Firefox on my refurbished Mac mini by downloading a copy from you website onto a flash drive from my old Mac, then installed it from the flash drive onto the much newer machine. I then clicked on the "import from another browser" the window told me that there was not anything to import. I then copied the bookmarks from my old machine onto the flash drive and put them in the new browser. I guess that because there was nothing to import at first, that "import" feature is still looking to be satisfied and that is why it is still stuck in my Toolbar. See image below.

I have not tried to "Fake it out" not sure how I could do that at this time.

Thanks Hal

PS. I like the old version 3.6.4 it seems to have a less busy "header" than this one, and I could remove all 3 Toolbars if I need the space on the window. I guess I will just have to get over it. :-)



/edit: moved thread from Firefox for iOS (for iPhone/iPad) to Firefox section as you have macOS.

title: Can't open Firefox because a copy of Firefox is already open
content:
I use a MacBook Pro running OS Monterey and I've gotten the dreaded "Firefox is already open" message. Firefox isn't my primary browser but I do have tabs and bookmarks saved there. This has happened before, and last time I ended up following advice to delete my profile which wiped out my entire account (it was the only profile there, and I should have looked for an alternate solution because that clearly wasn't it).

I was very interested in switching from Chrome to Firefox permanently, but I'll be honest, I'm pretty frustrated that this keeps happening and putting my tabs/bookmarks/history/etc in jeopardy. If someone could provide a straightforward explanation as to how to fix this I would greatly appreciate it.

Btw, I already tried viewing FireFox in the activity monitor as I saw another site suggest and it wouldn't let me quit it (I saw it greyed out).
creator: kmoyer424

title: "Your browser is managed by your organization", but I don't have an organization
content:
When I go into the Settings tab, I see a message at the top of the page that says "Your browser is managed by your organization". This is a private laptop so there should not be any organization managing my browser.

I have searched for help articles to try and solve this problem myself. They all recommend editing a key in the Windows registry, specifically HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Mozilla\Firefox . However, this registry folder does not exist in my laptop. Who is managing my browser? How can I stop them?
